video.series_name: Amy Schumer Presents Mark Normand: Don't Be Yourself
video.title: Amy Schumer Presents Mark Normand: Don't Be Yourself
video.series_description: Mark Normand has been told the same advice his whole life: DON'T BE YOURSELF, whatever you're thinking about saying, don't. So in his first one hour special, Mark does just that.
video.season_description: Mark Normand has been told the same advice his whole life: DON'T BE YOURSELF, whatever you're thinking about saying, don't. So in his first one hour special, Mark does just that.
video.episode_short_description: Mark Normand has been told the same advice his whole life: DON'T BE YOURSELF, whatever you're thinking about saying, don't. So in his first one hour special, Mark does just that.
video.episode_long_description: Mark Normand has been told the same advice his whole life: DON'T BE YOURSELF, whatever you're thinking about saying, don't. So in his first one hour special, Mark does just that. He's not a bad guy, but in a PC world where no one will discuss anything uncomfortable, how is Mark going to understand things if people won't explain them? Just because something is inappropriate, doesn't mean it's wrong.
video.actors_display: Mark Normand, Amy Schumer, Mark Normand, Amy Schumer, Steven Ast, Jakob Markovits, Kim Caramele, Ryan Cunningham, Kevin Kane, Ayesha Rokadia
